channel.title: Need help coding
channel.description: Ok on my server (all-star source) i want to make a portal that teleports you to a spot but you need 2b to enter it . I need to know how to check items like i know this code if (playerLevel[(stat id)] >= (level)) { .... but how do i make it check items? thanks![br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 01, 2009, 11:51:08 pm[/size][hr]bump[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 02, 2009, 12:02:46 am[/size][hr]...
